Subject: Network Drive
Description: Hello, we have a programme which sync files into the cloud (Tresorit). This programme generates a network drive but with the new client version 6.2.3.1 this network drive is blocked. With the old version 5.8.2.5 it works. Can you help me to change the right in the configuration? Thanks
Solution_Comment__c:
Minifilter driver changed the way the network share location is seen and Epp blocked it.
Customer was ok with turning off the minifilter driver.
